title: SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls, 3.5 inch 4 oz Clear Glass Bowls for Condiments, Small Glass Bowls, and Pinch Bowls (6 Pack)
descriptions:
Introducing the SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls, a must-have addition to your kitchenware collection. These sleek and simple bowls are designed to enhance your cooking and serving experience.

Measuring at 3.5 inches, these mini glass bowls have a capacity of 4 oz, making them perfect for a variety of uses. Whether you need them for condiments, spices, ingredients, prep work, candy, desserts, ice cream, or even storage, these bowls have got you covered. The 6-pack quantity ensures you'll always have enough bowls on hand for any task.

Crafted from high-quality glass, these bowls are not only stylish but also durable. They are designed to withstand the demands of both professional and home kitchens. The non-porous nature of the glass prevents absorption of odors and stains, ensuring each use is as fresh as the last.

One of the standout features of these bowls is their versatility. They are microwave-safe, allowing you to easily heat up your ingredients or leftovers. Cleaning up is a breeze as they are also dishwasher-safe. Plus, these bowls are stackable, making storage a cinch.

The SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls are suitable for a range of environments, including restaurants, cafes, bakeries, and homes. Their elegant design adds a touch of sophistication to any setting.

Don't settle for subpar bowls when you can elevate your culinary experience with the SQARR Mini Glass Prep Pinch Bowls. Upgrade your kitchen today!
